price: Nanso wͻ’buu no ͻtorofo. Enti asaase wosoͻ denden bi sͻͻ wͻn mu, afei wͻ’dedaa hͻ wͻ wͻn adan mu (wuwui).
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhathumu al-rajfatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīna
